text: Hey <@U2R2NANUC> is it normal for Java to be taking up this much RAM on the server?

<@U1N43E3E0>: yes that high java usage is due to enterprise miner's middleware subsystem (it's different on a server than your laptop). For teams that don't use miner I will disable it to free up that RAM.   Miner is probably using 8GB RAM just to sit there at idle due to the architecture we have.
Oh... interesting.  I think we will want to keep Enterprise Miner for now, but good to know.  Thanks <@U2R2NANUC> !
